think_procedure: The knob 'geqo_selection_bias' is examined based on its description. It is observed that the knob controls the selection bias used by GEQO and the values can range from 1.50 to 2.00. There is no mention of any special values such as -1 or 0 that would perform a different function or disable a feature. Therefore, it is concluded that this knob is not a 'special' knob.
